title: Digital Marketing Mastery
overview: Digital Marketing Mastery provides learners with the skills and knowledge to excel in online marketing strategies. This course covers essential topics such as SEO, content marketing, social media strategies, and data analytics. With practical projects and real-world case studies, students will gain hands-on experience in digital marketing.
courseDetails: In this course, you will explore the core areas of digital marketing, from building a strong online presence to optimizing campaigns for higher conversions. You'll learn about search engine optimization, email marketing, pay-per-click advertising, and analytics tools. This course is designed to give you practical skills to drive marketing success in the digital age.
certification: Upon completing this course, you will receive a certificate, qualifying you as a certified Digital Marketing Specialist.

Modules.name: Project: Create a Content Marketing Plan
